Header: SANJAYA RAJARATNAM APPOINTED ACTING SOLICITOR GENERAL
Content: Senior Additional Solicitor General Sanjaya Rajaratnam has been appointed as the Acting Solicitor General. The Attorney General's Coordinator, State Counsel Nishara Jayaratne said that the appointment was made by the Public Service Commission with immediate effect. The services of Solicitor General Dilrukshi Dias Wickremasinghe was suspended following a notification given by the Public Service Commission recently. It was based on a telephone conversation between Dilrukshi Dias Wickremasinghe, former Director General of the Bribery Commission and the Chairman of Avantgarde, Nissanka Senadhipathi.
